page.title: 10 SHOOTING AT CRICKET 1985
page.content: Shooting at Cricket St Thomas.It starts like this.Dad starts putting the pens up then he goes and checks the other pens.If there all right he rings up his Boss and sees what shooting dates there are.Dads Boss is called Nicholas de Savary.Dad needs to know how many Pheasants and Ducks are needed.Dad then has to order Pheasants and Ducks.He rings up Brian Mears and he is the man who breeds the birds.He tells Dad when he will bring the Pheasants and Ducks.After a few months he lets the birds out after fattening them up.Then he leaves them for a fortnight.Nicholas rings up my Dad and tells him he's coming shooting and Dad rings up the beaters and tells them to meet outside the Big House at 9.00am.After the shooting we come back,have a cup of tea,get our money and count the birds we got.
